solution_line_template: The company has chopped down a total of {trees_chopped_first_half} + {trees_chopped_second_half} = <<{trees_chopped_first_half}+{trees_chopped_second_half}={total_trees_chopped}>>{total_trees_chopped} trees throughout the year.

They plant {trees_planted_per_chopped} trees for every tree they chop so they need to plant {total_trees_chopped} trees * {trees_planted_per_chopped} = <<{total_trees_chopped}*{trees_planted_per_chopped}={total_trees_to_plant}>>{total_trees_to_plant} trees.
